ttScene.ttInitScript: vars:setVar("licesKilled", 1) vars:setVar("fanblowerDone", 0) vars:setVar("liceCombDone", 0) vars:setVar("tweezersDone", 0) vars:setVar("xrayDone", 0) vars:setVar("xrayEvents", 0) vars:setVar("axeDone", 0) vars:setVar("totalIceCleared", 0)

ttOperator.ttScript: return (fanBlowerDone == 1 and liceCombDone == 1 and tweezersDone == 1 and xrayDone == 1)
